website_summaries.verdict: An assortment of fidget toys for busy hands. This multipack has a nice variety.
pros: Includes stress ball, fidget chain, squishies, and more
Suitable for attention issues and autism
In addition to use in the classroom, the set also makes a nice gift
cons: The pieces are on the small side
If you're looking for larger handheld toys, look elsewhere

customer_reviews.title: Teachers perspective
customer_reviews.text: So there's a lot of good stuff in this bundle but not all of it is durable or helpful. The squishy stuff and the slime were not that great and didn't last long. The infinite rings and the boinks were awesome though and helped so much in class. The big ball with dots that you move around broke almost immediately when someone dropped it and the little balls went everywhere. However, this was a neat little bundle and I do not regret getting it.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Webb

customer_reviews.title: Sensory seeking perfection!!
customer_reviews.text: I have several children who are sensory seekers. This bag of goodies is the perfect collection of fidgets and what nots. They all loved trying out each one.
customer_reviews.author: Annee

customer_reviews.title: Great Selection! Good value!
customer_reviews.text: My doctor suggested I purchase a variety of tactile toys. She recommended I NOT get fidget spinners as they take two hands. This selection of toys can be "used" one handed. In my down time I enjoy reading, but my anxiety has been overwhelming lately. I has helped me shortcircuit some of that by keeping me engaged tactilely. Particularly love the little squeezy animals.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: Easily The Worst Box ever.
customer_reviews.text: All of these are super small, and the items are very fragile if you have a very energetic autistic kid who likes to bite, or stretch his toys, its a wrap. these are a no go. the pop tube bends in easily, the stretchy rope has like this sticky shell, to where if you stick it to something that carries lint. IT WILL ATTRACT IT!!! The only thing of value in this box is the Fidget Spinner clicker, and the Lava Lamp looking item. other than that, it's whole trash. WOULD NOT RECOMMEND!!
customer_reviews.author: ryan stewart

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality and Value!
customer_reviews.text: My son is 3 and autistic. He likes to bite on things. The squishy with little balls inside didn’t last more than 5 minutes in the house. The squishy items probably won’t. HOWEVER... this is an awesome sensory toy kit! Good quality and pretty cools items. I was impressed with the quality and different toys! I recommend this item. Also, cook gift for a young boy.
customer_reviews.author: Letteria

customer_reviews.title: Consult with therapists before buying these items!
customer_reviews.text: Box arrived broken. All of the squeeze items had rips or ripped immediately. Very cheaply made. There were no liquid things, putty, remote control. My son is very disappointed he can’t use it.
customer_reviews.author: ERICA M.

customer_reviews.title: Met expectations
customer_reviews.text: These were pretty much what I had expected, however, the sticky pieces collect dirt, dust, and any pet hair very quickly and are difficult to clean off. Wouldn't recommend for people with pets.
customer_reviews.author: Never

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited for this for my Kindergarten package. I opened it upon arrival and immediately without hardly any pressure one of the Rubics cube broke into so many pieces. The picture of the remote does not compare to what was received. Also the squishy toys are sticky and not ideal for classroom setting. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: S.H.N.4

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: I think this is an overall good deal but the my don’t last long in my building. I’m a school social worker and have about 600 kids in my building . Now that we are 1/2 way through the year the fidget toys need to be refreshed. Overall I give this set a good review and I would buy it again
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Gerardot

customer_reviews.title: Christmas present for our granddaughter
customer_reviews.text: We have a grand daughter who is 9 and we think and will be tested for autism. I got these and for the rest of the time they were at our house she had it and was playing with them all, and being calm.... a win win in my mind!
customer_reviews.author: JohawkTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Kids seem to like the Items
customer_reviews.text: Great fidget items perfect to set out on table for kids to play with. The don’t play with them long but they do pick them up off and on while at our house. So I do like the items. I just wish there were a few more items included at this price.
customer_reviews.author: krs

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot believe how freaking amazing this lot was! I honestly bought it because my son picked it out, I didn't hold my breath for it to be anything worth my time, but hey, you do for your kids when you can. It really is AWESOME! The squishy toys do pick up lint and hair and stuff, but just run them under water and voila! And I really love the little bubble thing, and the button ball. Oh! And I really really loved the remote thingy! I....he had so much fun with these toys!
customer_reviews.author: Misty Valzania

customer_reviews.title: Great variety
customer_reviews.text: A fun set of toys that I use with my son in his “chill zone.” They always help him calm down during a tantrum!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Overall great box just a couple things not as expected
customer_reviews.text: Love this box however the controller was different than what was expected. Also the ball is not able to be used really for how it's made to be used. Because it is missing one of the colored balls so you can do anything with it. And you can see the foam right inside it. Maybe the company can just send me a new white sensory ball? Otherwise great box.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Hance

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Purchased my my 3 year old great granddaughter. She has sensory disorders and these fidget toys keep her from having melt downs. I was pleasantly surprised at the quantity and quality for price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonion Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great bundle, but dangerous defect on spinner cube toy.
customer_reviews.text: Over all, this was a great bundle and worth the money. However, the fidget cube/spinner had a sharp piece of metal protruding from it, making it dangerous and unusable for my children. This was disappointing as it would have been a very useful item for them to use.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Houghton

customer_reviews.title: Not good for pre-teens
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would help my child get through the summer and have some fidgets. My pre-teen was excited at first, used them for a while, and then forgot about them.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Burbidge Merkley

customer_reviews.title: Choose wisely
customer_reviews.text: Horrible quality. 4 things broke the first day we received them. One of the items doesn’t match part of the description. The slime dried out with the lid on it.
customer_reviews.author: o0starone0o

customer_reviews.title: Great variety of items
customer_reviews.text: There were several pieces which is great for the price. The squishees are a little small, but my daughter enjoys them!
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne S.

customer_reviews.title: Item not as described
customer_reviews.text: Some of the items are different than what shows in the picture
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Better toys out there
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my 10 yr old with sever ADHD, even the sturdier toys broke rather quickly. You can find better fidget toys elsewhere .
customer_reviews.author: Tully Crow

customer_reviews.title: great product. All quality prizes
customer_reviews.text: No dumb toys in here! They are all winners. I had to buy a second pack bc my family fought over it and even my husband begged me for one of the pcs.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: My son needed some new items for his calm down corner. Thus far we have been happy with this kit. Also, for the most part the fidgets seems holding up well and they have taken some abuse.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Falls apart in 1 day, very sad
customer_reviews.text: Most of these items were extremely low quality and cheaply made. Some fell apart just within 1 day and could not be used anymore. It also didn't include exactly what was in the photo.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Woodstock

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product!
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect! My kids love their new fidget toys and I love seeing them play with things that stimulate their brains differently than video games all the time. I even play with these myself. Also, the seller is amazing. Their dedication to quality and satisfied customers is unmatched. Hands down.
customer_reviews.author: Nadya Senia

customer_reviews.title: Good option for fidgeters
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son who fidgets like crazy. Overall it's been a great package for him. I'm only taking one star because they are a little small... But still function fine and my son doesn't seem to mind.
customer_reviews.author: DonniS

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was expecting
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this, but I’m very disappointed... lots of things I’m unhappy with. Not worth the 20 dollars.
customer_reviews.author: Sabyan

customer_reviews.title: Great assortment!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for a child with ASD. Awesome fidgets; would be a great gift for anyone who loves to fidget! He loved the ball with the multi-colored buttons the best but they’re all great!
customer_reviews.author: Lbeckit

customer_reviews.title: Awful product
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your money! These are terrible, they are cheap and just not worth the money. Do not order!
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Myracle

customer_reviews.title: good buy ...
customer_reviews.text: Kids do like these toys would have like larger Rubic cubes but still nice .. good for my autistic kids sensory...
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Not a good buy at all. Two of the fidget toys were broken when I recieved this package in the mail. Not a good quality product. Do not recommend!
customer_reviews.author: RoseChic

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for stress
customer_reviews.text: My 11 year old and 3 year old love this set! Purchased to help with stress and fidgeting habits
customer_reviews.author: Leah Q

customer_reviews.title: Not All items pictured included
customer_reviews.text: Wanted this bundle because the photo showed the black remote fidget toy. It does not come with this. I felt mislead but it's not worth sending back. The putty is also questionable. The other items a good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: ajjdallas

customer_reviews.title: Some stuff cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Was a little disappointed the same day we got this fidget box,the same day this toy broke.
customer_reviews.author: sharon

customer_reviews.title: Quarantine School life savers!
customer_reviews.text: At home with fidgety kids during quarantine school. This collection of fidgets has a good variety. Priced right and the it was delivered to my house quickly. When nerves are wearing thin (both mom and "student") appreciate these fun distractions while we get our schooling on!
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Half the toys are cheap like a gumball machine toy. The "stress ball" is sticky so whatever it touches it picks up particals leaving it gunky. Half the stuff got thrown out
customer_reviews.author: Crystal C.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: This is cheap, but most of the stuff is useable. Some of the non plastic things were thrown away within a few days.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Fields

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Different textures and gadgets to fidget with for my kids - good buy to keep them busy - even if they’re just sitting around watching tv
customer_reviews.author: Lena

customer_reviews.title: Nice Variety
customer_reviews.text: Good variety of fidgets, my only negative in some of the squishy items have an unpleasant smell, and probably need to off gas.
customer_reviews.author: A. Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Something to play with and not break
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 16 year old son who has ADHD. He needed a new fidget to use during long e-learning days. This was a great assortment and they are holding up to his constant use. He also loved that it was a variety pack.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Lank

customer_reviews.title: Awesome purchase
customer_reviews.text: I’ve read a lot of bad reviews on this product and I’m honestly confused ! The package was perfect . Yes it’s small but it’s for FIDGETING. Obviously it should be small !!! It also came with rubix cubes it wasn’t pictured but I’m thankful I got an extra gift . I love it. Very satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Lilac

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this the only thing I don’t like about it is the box was open nothing was broken or anything but other then that this is a great product
customer_reviews.author: Tracieblough@gmail

customer_reviews.title: Broke immediately
customer_reviews.text: How disappointing-2 items broke within minutes of opening the box. I emailed the company-no response!
customer_reviews.author: kjl

customer_reviews.title: No disappointment
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product. The rubiks cubes are a little easy to break, but I'm not disappointed. Everything in the box is very stress reliving and I loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten Srinivasan

customer_reviews.title: Great value!!
customer_reviews.text: My ADHD daughter loves it and has found it very helpful!!
customer_reviews.author: tinkersyl

customer_reviews.title: Changeo
customer_reviews.text: Most of the items are ok but one was very sticky even when I washed it off and smelled like chemicals. Just threw it away.
customer_reviews.author: Tamera Derby

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my adhd 11y old son. It is great he has always something to keep his hands busy. Cheap and came in on time. It is great.
customer_reviews.author: Omariz Aguero

customer_reviews.title: Toys
customer_reviews.text: He really likes the long worm like ropes the best.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overall good product
customer_reviews.text: The package came earlier than the time expecting. The cubs did not come. The slime is a butter slime it easily gits miked with the other slime but it easy to change right back to its color.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Morris

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensory
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it for his sensory issues. Its a good value
customer_reviews.author: NYC Coach

customer_reviews.title: Thank you
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it. Good quality only thing I wish they were a bit bigger
customer_reviews.author: Jv

customer_reviews.title: Misleading
customer_reviews.text: It was ok but. I’m a little dissatisfied because they product looks nothing like the picture and puzzle ball was super easy. They are cheap toys that will keep a kid busy for a little bit
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: They’re okay!
customer_reviews.text: They’re kind of small so if this is for a kiddo, if they like putting things in their mouth I wouldn’t recommend. However! Great assortment of toys.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Pledger

customer_reviews.title: just okay
customer_reviews.text: Not great quality items... but fine to use temporarily and toss.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Good quanity but quality is lacking
customer_reviews.text: Fun items and good for a older kid. My toddlers destroyed most of the items in about a minute.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: I liked most of these. The drip one wasnt good at all. Doesn't drip like it should. The others were good though
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Order Process was quick easy and delivered fast!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with product. My 12 yr old has ADHD and ODD and has been after me to get her one of these pkgs. She is happy with product and I am happy with the whole order process. It was fast, easy and order got here within 3 days. Would recommend and will place more orders in the future. Sincerely, Niki
customer_reviews.author: NIKI HUNT

customer_reviews.title: Decent product.
customer_reviews.text: Good assortment. Some items are flimsy & broke easily. My ADHD kiddo loves them though.
customer_reviews.author: Brandywine

customer_reviews.title: They are very nice!
customer_reviews.text: They were very useful but some of them were s little cheap
customer_reviews.author: Eric in Oregon

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic for kids to play with at homework table to be quiet while I’m helping another child.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila V.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Almost everything is really durable...my daughter is pretty destructive and super sensory seeker...she loves everything but the slime its weird and feels really wet
customer_reviews.author: Holly Merritt

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Horribly cheap "toys" not really useful for anxiety. Way over priced.
customer_reviews.author: Terry M.

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: Very cute but the clear thing with the ruber rainbow beads had only 10 beads in it . The "slime" is just clay and lotion so the slime was wet because they put to much lotion. Every thing else was fine.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Caillouet

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my nephew with DS!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 3 year old nephew with Down Syndrome. Some of the objects are too small for him. But the majority of the toys are perfect sensory toys for him.
customer_reviews.author: AmandaS23

customer_reviews.title: find another one ! trust me
customer_reviews.text: i liked how fast it came, but it just look like it was thrown together. the fidget ring thing was much bigger then I anticipated. my squishy toys were broken, The fidget controller was not what the picture said, but other then that it was okay
customer_reviews.author: April W

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: The fidget stick was not like the one that I ordered the squishy with all the balls in it had a hold in it when it came out of the box
customer_reviews.author: amy neal

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Overall pretty decent for the price. The squishy fidget toys are sticky so they collect dust (and virtually anything else nearby) very easily so we really could only use about 2/3rds of the bundle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a gift, it was a hit for my autistic nephew .
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Mauga

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 7 year old autistic son and he didn't seem very interested on them after about 5 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Elizabeth Sellers

customer_reviews.title: Worst thing I ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: Opened this product and within 10 mins each item Was broken
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Great products!
customer_reviews.text: Great products! Got these for my grandfather with Alzheimer’s disease. He isn’t into them, but the rest of the family loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my 9yo
customer_reviews.text: my 9 year old lived this package! Fast shopping was a bonus!
customer_reviews.author: Cherie

customer_reviews.title: Figit tools are tiny
customer_reviews.text: The figit tools are tiny compared to what the picture alluded to. Was very surprised and not happy about this.
customer_reviews.author: CasaGomez

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: You get just what you see. The sizes were perfect for our three kids and so far seem pretty durable. I'd buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Would not recommend. The items do not look like the picture. The white ball with the different colors arrived missing pieces. The black fidget pad looks nothing like the picture. The box was partially open. I’m not at all impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Fun addition to Saran Wrap ball
customer_reviews.text: We love doing the Saran Wrap ball every Christmas. I added these to ours this year and everyone loved them from age six to eighty six!
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Good Items
customer_reviews.text: I used this for my classroom. I found it all appropriate.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Lisby

customer_reviews.title: Great variety for price
customer_reviews.text: For what this is, it's nice. Inexpensive, small, and with nice variety. I like the puzzle ball the most, but find the most use from the fidget block.
customer_reviews.author: americanspirits

customer_reviews.title: Breaks easily
customer_reviews.text: After 10 minutes, two items were broken. Within a day, 3 of the items were broken. Very cheaply made. The ball had a sharp plastic shard attached to it. Not worth your money.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The whole idea is cute but the fidgets aren’t very durable
customer_reviews.text: The concept is really cute. There are a lot of options to utilize. It’s not very durable stuff though. The squishy ball broke on the first day and the other ball in the box falls apart pretty easily.
customer_reviews.author: karen

customer_reviews.title: Works for all types of people
customer_reviews.text: Good purchase for the price. I sent them to my daughters at sleepaway camp. All the girls liked them.
customer_reviews.author: Jody Bernstein

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: It was a bit disappointing. The bubble fidget had leaked and Some of the buttons on the clicker didn’t work. I decided not to take the time to rebox and return.
customer_reviews.author: cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Some items don’t look like the pictures
customer_reviews.text: The fidget control was very different from the picture, despite that every product was included in the package and all was very nice quality :))
customer_reviews.author: I-0

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t recommend
customer_reviews.text: Cute idea. Kinda cheap, and not so impressed with what these fidgets looked like in person
customer_reviews.author: Adrianne

customer_reviews.title: stress ball came deflated
customer_reviews.text: the other toys are fine, but the main reason i purchased this was for the DNA stress ball. To my disappointment it was very deflated, barley filled, and smaller than advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Wilfong

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: My son love these figets! They have really helped relieve some of his sensory challenges
customer_reviews.author: paige o

customer_reviews.title: Perfect set of fidget toys
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect stocking stuffers for my little boys. They love these for read aloud time and they are very engaging.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Fidgets, though one came broken
customer_reviews.text: All the fidgets were awesome but the liquid drip plastic toy was cracked on one end and leaked into the box. All the other fidgets work great.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Rosenvall

customer_reviews.title: Relieved stress !
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful for kid have problems being social they still have something to fidget with.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Chunn

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Grandson is autistic and this keeps him occupied when his hands need to be- good for the price
customer_reviews.author: Kelcee Davis

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than they seem but great for the price
customer_reviews.text: It was great in general for the price. The Rubix cubes are mini and the stress ball broke the minute I touched it but everything besides that was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Customer1567

customer_reviews.title: variety
customer_reviews.text: This was a nice variety. Useful for all age of students.
customer_reviews.author: Boomer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Not worth it! Poor quality and useless; this doesn’t really work for sensory therapy.
customer_reviews.author: MICHEL

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality. Some of the pieces were broken on arrival and many of them broke the first time they were used. Total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: lindsey dowling

customer_reviews.title: These are AMAZING!!
customer_reviews.text: I have anxiety and these were amazing!! Non of them were damaged/broken. They are in perfect condition too! Very fast shipping :)
customer_reviews.author: gracexcarla

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Very awesome it will be a perfect gift exactly what expected. Quality awesome!
customer_reviews.author: alicia decosta

customer_reviews.title: Very good sensory toy
customer_reviews.text: These toys are very good. They can train my son’s hand muscles. It is a very good sensory training.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen.L

customer_reviews.title: No gift box
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for someone and it didn't come in black box shown, just thrown in a bag. Disappointing

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: This was so great I loved everything that came in it And all of them take my mind off stress from work

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Anxieties
customer_reviews.text: This bundle contains a variety of items to help with stress and anxieties.

product_meta.title: Sensory Fidget Toys Bundle-DNA Stress Relief Balls with Fidget Hand Toys for Anxiety Kids & Adults-Calming Toys for ADHD Autism Anxiety
product_meta.description: Package:1Fluffy Slime,2Mini Cube,2 Pack Mochi Animals Squishies,1 Liquid Motion,1 DNA Stress Balls,1 fidget bike chain,5 marble toys,2 stretch squeeze toys，1 magic raibow cube and 1 fidget cube
feature_bullets: Package:1Fluffy Slime,2Mini Cube,2 Pack Mochi Animals Squishies,1 Liquid Motion,1 DNA Stress Balls,1 fidget bike chain,5 marble toys,2 stretch squeeze toys，1 magic raibow cube and 1 fidget cube
Mochi Animals Squishies,Super cute design,Soft silicone, it's stretchy and sticky. it's great for killing time and kids gift.
Liquid Motion,Its slow and rhythmic drops have a very appeasing effect and actually help kids with sensory or hyperactivity issues. Makes perfect autism sensory toys to sooth and remain focused.
These squishy balls are designed to relieve anxiety and help promote better focus and clarity by helping ease bouts of ADHD, ADD or Autism.
Other Fidget and Sensory Toys,perfect for ADD/ADHD Autism kids student to keep forcus
